actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to make it unlawful employment practice to discriminate against individuals who are physically handicapped because of such handicap.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Makes it an unlawful employment practice under the Civil Rights Act to discriminate against individuals who are physically handicapped because of such handicap.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to make it unlawful employment practice to discriminate against individuals who are physically handicapped because of such handicap.
